mapper.select: SELECT xt_loadinfo.`xt_loadinfo_id`, xt_loadinfo.`xt_loadinfo_modules`, xt_loadinfo.`xt_loadinfo_time`, DATE_FORMAT(xt_loadinfo.`xt_loadinfo_begtime`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `xt_loadinfo_begtime`, DATE_FORMAT(xt_loadinfo.`xt_loadinfo_endtime`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `xt_loadinfo_endtime`, xt_loadinfo.`xt_userinfo_id`, xt_userinfo.`xt_userinfo_realName` FROM xt_loadinfo xt_loadinfo LEFT JOIN xt_userinfo xt_userinfo ON xt_loadinfo.xt_userinfo_id=xt_userinfo.xt_userinfo_id WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY xt_loadinfo_begtime DESC
